类的使用
cardgame.Card

  • cardgame中Card的使用

    返回Card的cardgame中的方法
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    Card Chessboard.getCard​(int x, int y)
    We get the card in the array according to the coordinates x, y
    Card Chessboard.getCard​(int n, java.lang.Boolean d)
    Get the card in the array according to the card number (d=true means to delete the card here)
    Card Deck.getHiddeCard()  
    Card Deck.MoveTheTopCard()
    Remove the top card from the deck, we used linkedlist.pop() method for the action of remove and we mark down each card drawn
    Card Play.VectoryCard()
    We show out the victory card.
    参数类型为Card的cardgame中的方法
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    void Play.DrawCard​(Card card)
    The method of drawing cards, the first card of the handcard is the victory card.
    void Chessboard.InputCard​(Card card, int targetCard, java.lang.String direction)
    This method is used to put in card in the position I want to put in the chessboard
    int Chessboard.Scoring_Color​(Card card)
    We calculate the score of color, score of color= 6a+5b+4c, a=Five consecutive colors are the same, b=Four consecutive colors are the same, c=Three consecutive colors are the same
    int Chessboard.Scoring_Filled​(Card card)
    We calculate the score of filled, score of filled= 5a+4b+3c, a=Five consecutive fill colors are the same, b=Four consecutive fill colors are the same, c=Three consecutive fill colors are the same
    int Chessboard.Scoring_Shape​(Card card)
    We calculate the score of shape, score of shape= 4a+3b+2c+d, a=Five consecutive same shapes, b=Four consecutive same shapes, c=Three consecutive same shapes, d=Two consecutive same shapes.
    void Chessboard.setCard​(int x, int y, Card card)
    the method of putting card on the board
    void Play.setVectoryCard​(Card card)
    Set the victory card of the player or the computer.
